Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Markezinis Suites has 4 double suites and 2 Markezinis suites. The Mansion can be also booked as a Villa. Facilities include direct dial phone, bell-boy service, Wi-Fi internet access in all areas of the Mansion, 24h reception, 24h room-service, laundry services, turn-down services, consierge services.

Important place or monument close to the hotel: Situated in the middle of the Messaria, 5 minutes walk from the village's main square, 8 km from the Athinios Port. Nearest airport: International airport of Santorini - 3km.
